[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”about-section ccTxt” css=”.vc_custom_1601888364792{margin-top: -10px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”At Conc@t, our business is helping your business succeed. JARKS CTC collaborate with both the service seekers and the service providers by providing a powerful support system.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”abtConc@tMobCtrl”][vc_column_text]CONC@T is a leading B2B marketplace for Cross-Functional Business Outsourcing, Consulting, and Execution needs through the platform JARKS CTC Private Limited.

We understand business & curate tailor-made solutions by weaving together the right strategy, right execution partner, and right technology within a budget and timelines. We own end-to-end delivery, thereby reducing the risk and liability, promising efficient and on-time delivery. The CONC@T stamp ensures transparency, trust & commitment.

Our Practice Leaders across IT, Finance, HR, Legal, Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, Content, L&D, Academics, and Insurance are Industry stalwarts in their domains and bring a rich experience of 25+ years each.

Backed by a robust platform offering 12 services verticals, 350 unique services, 500+ execution partners, and 100+ subject-matter expert consultants, we own the strategy, delivery & governance.

If you are a business consulting firm in India providing business consulting services or a management consulting firm providing solutions to solve modern-day problems? We are your one-stop shop for all business solutions.

Connect | Consult | Collaborate

Signup Now for Best Results [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1603208474908{background-color: #ededed !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”3006″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1603208474908{background-color: #ededed !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_single_image image=”1287″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”slider-wraper”][vc_column el_class=”operate-slider”]

B2B Marketplace | Conc@t Services Portfolio

Conc@t offers a wide range of service portfolio consisting of 12 key verticals and 350 plus unique services across Information Technology, Finance, Legal & Secretarial, HR & Trainings, Sales & Distribution, Marketing, Customer excellence, Projects, Infra, Admin, Logistics, Content & academics, Concierge, Insurance & Investment.

Service Seeker

Need a trusted partner with strong fundamentals to own multiple operational touch points.

  • Helping you focus on your own core business operations
  • Seeks a reliable partner with requisite subject matter expertise
  • Needs wide range of services at best commercials
  • Corporate assurance on effective service delivery

Sign Up Now View Package[/vc_wp_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”sPackagesStyle MObHideServices” css=”.vc_custom_1603891077300{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”273″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_circle_2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_wp_text]

A subject matter expert, governance mentor serving as a link between service seeker & service provider.

  • Verified and trustworthy subject matter expert of respective domain
  • Bridge between service seeker and service provider
  • Ensures successful project allocation, governance and delivery

Sign Up Now View Package[/vc_wp_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”sPackagesStyle MObHideServices”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”servicePhraseCtrl”][vc_single_image image=”274″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_circle_2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_wp_text]

  • Sitting on idle capacity
  • Needs immediate qualified leads commensurate to the size of the business
  • Presently struggling with high cost of qualified lead generation
  • Corporate assurance on payments

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”cTestiMobCTrl”][vc_column_inner el_class=”item1″ width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2338″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle”][vc_column_text]

We have recently introduced an OKR based performance management system for our group of companies. Conc@t team helped us in designing the PMS process, selecting the right technology and implementing it. They also helped in the entire change management to make our transition seamless. It was a great learning and smooth rollout, I have ever had.

COO
Perfact Group

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”item1″ width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1003″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle”][vc_column_text]

We recently invested in an exciting early-stage startup company and wanted to create a differentiated brand strategy. The Conc@t team’s selected agency ran an excellent one-day workshop for all the company stakeholders. In the end, we agreed that we had crafted a brand strategy that was unique, competitive, and would help us to create a large brand.

Co-Founder
Autus Consultancy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”item1″ width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1342″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle”][vc_column_text]

Efficient and effective platform to find world-class consultants. I recently hired one consultant in sales and distribution for my new line of products. All my challenges were sorted under one roof, Thanks Conc@t.

Business Owner
Shoes and Soles
